title: What is MVC?
author: Trygve Reenskaug
article: MVC stands for Model-View-Controller, and it's a software architectural pattern commonly used in designing and organizing code for applications, especially those with graphical user interfaces.

title: What is Sequelize?
author: Sascha Depold
article: Sequelize is a popular Object-Relational Mapping (ORM) library for Node.js. It provides a way to interact with relational databases, such as MySQL, PostgreSQL, SQLite, and Microsoft SQL Server, using JavaScript code and object-oriented concepts.

title: Object Relational Mapping
author: Anonymous
article: Object-Relational Mapping (ORM) is a programming technique and architectural pattern that enables developers to interact with relational databases using object-oriented programming languages and concepts.
